liquors.name: Glenfiddich 18yrs 700ml
liquors.description: Richly delivers luxurious dried fruit, candy peel and dates. Overlaid with elegant oak notes.

liquors.name: Balvenie Caribbean Cask 14 years 700ml
liquors.description: Balvenie Caribbean Cask 14 years single malt whisky has been matured in traditional oak whisky casks for 14 years, and then finished in casks that previously held Caribbean rum.

liquors.name: Woodford Reserve 700ml
liquors.description: Woodford Reserve is a clean, brilliant honey amber-appearing Kentucky Bourbon. It consists of over 200 detectable flavour notes ranging from bold grain and wood to sweet aromatics, spice, and fruity floral notes.

liquors.name: Martell XO 700ml
liquors.description: Martell XO is made by blending Eaux-de-vie from both the Borderies and Grande Champagne regions. The brilliant Martell XO  is a soft, mellow cognac with hints of rancio, citrus, blossom and walnut.

liquors.name: Dom Perignon 750ml
liquors.description: Dom Perignon expresses confident, enhanced maturity. The assertive character of this wine now gives it genuine and authentic power; a delicate complexity woven through with freshness and minerality, coming together in a light texture. It conjures up pale gold, enhanced with the energy of light: radiant gold.

liquors.name: Simonsig Frans Malan Dry Red 750ml
liquors.description: The Frans Malan Dry Wine is a blend of different grape varieties, including Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, and Cabernet Franc. It has a deep ruby colour, complex aromas, and rich flavours.

liquors.name: Bacalhoa Moscatel 750ml
liquors.description: It has a deep amber colour and a sweet, honeyed flavour with notes of caramel, dried fruit, and spices such as cinnamon and nutmeg. It has a smooth and velvety texture, with a long and lingering finish.

liquors.name: JP Chenet Sauvignon Blanc 750ml
liquors.description: JP Chenet Sauvignon Blanc is a highly aromatic and very light French wine.

liquors.name: Luc Belaire Rose 750ml
liquors.description: Luc Belaire Rose is a dramatically beautiful sparkling rose: a rich, vibrant pink colour.

liquors.name: Ciroc 1 Litre
liquors.description: Lusciously smooth & playfully sophisticated, Ciroc Vodka is a commitment to superior taste, quality and a fun-loving lifestyle.

liquors.name: Konyagi 750ml
liquors.description: Konyagi has Citrus, tropical fruit and spicy notes. The flavouring is nice and not overdone. Smooth enough to drink on its own
